name: OpenAI API Key
description: Set up API keys for OpenAI services like GPT-4 and DALL-E

setupSteps.label: Open OpenAI API Keys Page
setupSteps.description: Log in to your OpenAI account and navigate to the API Keys section of the user settings.

setupSteps.text: Click on **Create new secret key** to generate a new API key.

setupSteps.label: OpenAI Secret Key
setupSteps.hint: Copy the newly generated key from the OpenAI page and paste it here.

commonIssues.verification_error_401: Invalid API key. Please check that you've copied the key correctly.
commonIssues.verification_error_429: Rate limit exceeded. Your API key works, but has hit the rate limit.

langchain.import_code:
from langchain.llms import OpenAI
llm = OpenAI()

automationActions.fetchKey: Automatically fetches a newly created API key from the OpenAI dashboard.
automationActions.verifyKey: Verifies if the API key is valid by making a test request.
